00144 int nfs_Lookup( nfs_arg_t            * parg,    
00145                 exportlist_t         * pexport, 
00146                 fsal_op_context_t          * pcontext,   
00147                 cache_inode_client_t * pclient,
00148                 hash_table_t         * ht,
00149                 struct svc_req       * preq,    
00150                 nfs_res_t            * pres )   
00151 {
00152         static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Lookup";
00153         
00154   cache_entry_t           * pentry_dir ;
00155         cache_entry_t           * pentry_file ;
00156   cache_inode_status_t      cache_status ;
00157   fsal_attrib_list_t        attr ;
00158   fsal_attrib_list_t        attrdir ;
00159   char *                    strpath = NULL;
00160         fsal_name_t               name ;
00161   fsal_handle_t           * pfsal_handle ;
00162   cache_inode_fsal_data_t   fsal_data ;
00163   int                       rc ;
00164   
00165         if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00166     {
00167       /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00168       pres->res_lookup3.LOOKUP3res_u.resfail.dir_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00169     }
00170 
00171 
00172   if( ( pentry_dir = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00173                                          &(parg->arg_lookup2.dir), 
00174                                          &(parg->arg_lookup3.what.dir),
00175                                          NULL, 
00176                                          &(pres->res_dirop2.status),
00177                                          &(pres->res_lookup3.status),
00178                                          NULL,
00179                                          &attrdir, 
00180                                          pcontext, 
00181                                          pclient, 
00182                                          ht, 
00183                                          &rc ) ) == NULL )
00184     {
00185       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00186       return rc ;
00187    }
00188         
00189         switch( preq->rq_vers )
00190     {
00191     case NFS_V2:
00192                         strpath = parg->arg_lookup2.name;
00193                         break;
00194       
00195     case NFS_V3:
00196       strpath = parg->arg_lookup3.what.name;
00197       break;
00198     }
00199   
00200   /* Do the lookup */
00201   pentry_file = NULL ;
00202 
00203   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_str2name( strpath, 
00204                                                                  FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN,
00205                                                                  &name ) ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00206     {
00207       /* BUGAZOMEU: Faire la gestion des cross junction traverse */
00208       if( ( pentry_file = cache_inode_lookup( pentry_dir, 
00209                                               &name, 
00210                                               &attr, 
00211                                               ht,
00212                                               pclient,
00213                                               pcontext, 
00214                                               &cache_status ) ) != NULL )
00215         {
00216           /* Do not forget cross junction management */
00217           pfsal_handle = cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( pentry_file, &cache_status ) ;
00218           if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00219             {
00220               switch( preq->rq_vers )
00221                 {
00222                 case NFS_V2:
00223                   /* Build file handle */
00224                   if( nfs2_FSALToFhandle( &(pres->res_dirop2.DIROP2res_u.diropok.file), pfsal_handle, pexport ) )
00225                     {
00226                       if( nfs2_FSALattr_To_Fattr( pexport, &attr, 
00227                                                   &(pres->res_dirop2.DIROP2res_u.diropok.attributes) ) )
00228                         {
00229                           pres->res_dirop2.status = NFS_OK;
00230                         }
00231                     }
00232                   break ;
00233                   
00234                 case NFS_V3:              
00235                   /* Build FH */
00236                   if( ( pres->res_lookup3.LOOKUP3res_u.resok.object.data.data_val = Mem_Alloc( NFS3_FHSIZE ) ) == NULL )
00237                     pres->res_lookup3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL ;
00238                   else
00239                     {
00240                       if( nfs3_FSALToFhandle( (nfs_fh3 *)&(pres->res_lookup3.LOOKUP3res_u.resok.object.data), 
00241                                               pfsal_handle, pexport )  )
00242                         {
00243                           
00244                           /* Build entry attributes */
00245                           nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00246                                              pentry_file,
00247                                              &attr,
00248                                              &(pres->res_lookup3.LOOKUP3res_u.resok.obj_attributes));
00249                           
00250                           /* Build directory attributes */
00251                           nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00252                                              pentry_dir, 
00253                                              &attrdir,
00254                                              &(pres->res_lookup3.LOOKUP3res_u.resok.dir_attributes));
00255                           
00256                           pres->res_lookup3.status = NFS3_OK;
00257                         } /* if */
00258                     } /* else */
00259                   break; 
00260                 } /* case */
00261             } /* if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) */
00262         }  /* if( ( pentry_file = cache_inode_lookup... */
00263     } /* if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert... */
00264   
00265   /* If we are here, there was an error */
00266   if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00267     {
00268       return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00269     }    
00270 
00271   if( cache_status != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00272     {
00273       nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00274                            preq->rq_vers, 
00275                            cache_status,
00276                            &pres->res_dirop2.status,
00277                            &pres->res_lookup3.status,
00278                            pentry_dir,
00279                            &(pres->res_lookup3.LOOKUP3res_u.resfail.dir_attributes),
00280                            NULL, NULL, NULL,
00281                            NULL, NULL, NULL);
00282     }
00283 
00284   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00285 } /* nfs_Lookup */
00286 
00295 void nfs3_Lookup_Free( nfs_res_t * resp ) 
00296 {
00297   if (resp->res_lookup3.status == NFS3_OK)
00298     Mem_Free(resp->res_lookup3.LOOKUP3res_u.resok.object.data.data_val);
00299 } /* nfs_Lookup_Free */
00300 
00309 void nfs2_Lookup_Free( nfs_res_t * resp ) 
00310 {
00311   /* nothing to do */
00312   return;
00313 } /* nfs_Lookup_Free */
